comments.body:
Doesn't sound correct.
`Define whether HTTP/HTTPS protocol should be enabled for the filesystem.`?
@gundalow The device I'm doing this module for can have HTTP or HTTPS access to the filesystem as well as classic NFS/SMB. Newer applications can use these protocols to stream files

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +63,67 @@  http:
    description:
      - Define whether to HTTP/HTTPS protocol is enabled for the filesystem.
    required: false
    type: bool
